file_content.text: <<1>> has sliced the elevator.
Malgus is filling <<1>>'s mind with visons of doubt!
The doubt weighs heavy on <<1>>, they must face their destiny!
The time has come! <<1>> must face Malgus alone!
<<1>> has repaired the elevator.
<<1>> has repaired the drill.
<<1>> has opened the sealed door.
<<1>> has repaired the battledroid.
<<1>> has repaired the medical droid.
<<1>> has collected a biological sample.
<<1>> has deactivated the forcefields.
You already have a follower.
<<1>> is resisting arrest and must be terminated!
<<1>> is under arrest! Stop EN-4C from neutralizing them!
<<1>> used explosives to open the sealed door.
Explosives are required to open this door.
<<1>> has collected the explosives.
<<1>> has repaired the security gate.
<<1>> has released the prisoner.
<<1>> has rescued the caged hound.
<<1>> has called for reinforcements!
Purchase a VIP wristband to enter. Available with Digital Deluxe.
[Console D-1] Power temporarily routed to generator D-2.
[Console D-2] Power temporarily routed to generator D-1.
[Power Failure] Routes D-1 and D-2 have been reset.
[Console] Route successful: Power diverted from ISS-7.
<<1>> has enabled the enforcer cruisier.
<<1>> has repaired the combat droid.
<<1>> has released a caged hound.
<<1>> has attracted a young Alchemical Snarler.
<<1>> has been targeted by Mentor's claw.
[Stasis Chamber] Shutdown sequence code entered...
<<1>> has been scanned. Searching for matching organic...
A cyborg replacement for <<1>> has been released.
Initializing automatic Target Lock system...
Level 1 Target Lock acquired! Missile damage increased by 100%
Level 2 Target Lock acquired! Missile damage increased by 200%
Level 3 Target Lock acquired! Missile damage increased by 300%
Ship targeting systems disrupted! Target Lock reset!
Commander Lk'graagth has ordered his squad to attack <<1>>!
G'klarg is becoming angry!
G'klarg howls angrily in pain!
The Behemoth has entered a frenzy. Run!
The Drouks are near each other and are growing stronger!
<<1>> has been targeted by Ball Lightning!
Doctor Lorrick is activating a Kolto Tank!
The Drouks are unstoppable!
Mine is defusable for 15 seconds!
Mine is defusable for 10 seconds!
Mine is defusable for 5 seconds!
Not usable at this time.
<<1>> got the landmine defusal kit!
<<1>> has the probe launcher access card!
You need an access card.
Project Sav-Rak prepares to Sav-Rak Smash!
Project Sav-Rak jumps onto a pipe!
Unauthorized access attempt detected.::Transferring power to Security Systems.
Engaging security systems to secure laboratory access.
Northern pylon wheel has been solved!
Southern pylon wheel has been solved!
Both pylon wheels have been solved! Advancing to next wheel.
Door controls offline.::Re-route power using Power Controls to enable door controls.
Time Failure: The ancient pylons have reset.
Doctor Lorrick powers up a Kolto Tank.
Transgenic Sample Eleven smashes the facility floor.
Toth is berserk! Stay away!
The Pulsar Droids are reversing their circuits!
Colonel Vorgath switches targets!
Kovic readies his grenades!
Kovic runs out of grenades.
Kovic locates a nearby cache of grenades.
Kovic begins to call in Airstrikes!
Aborting minefield attempt...
Unable to abort minefield attempt while in combat.
Manual Override: The ancient pylons have reset.
Kel'sara has marked <<1>> for death!
Malgus' resolve is wavering! He appears vulnerable!
The Savage is fixated on <<1>>!
Krel Thak activates his Proximity Probe!
Kephess aims a Radioactive Barrage at <<1>>!
Corrupted Nanites on you!
Kephess fires a Bracer Salvo at <<1>>!
<<1>> begins to interface with the Hypergate Control Tower!
<<1>> destroys the Hypergate Control Tower.
Kephess charges a focused Laser Blast at <<1>>!
<<1>> has deactivated the core shields!
You've attacked the Beastmaster and the Savage is growing insane!
Exhaustion Zone! Turn back now!
The time to face your destiny has expired!
<<1>> uses Dreadful Essence on Dreadtooth.
Malfunctioning Controller activating self destruct sequence!
Operation restored. Power levels at fifty percent.
Operation restored. Power levels at one hundred percent.
Error. Inadequate power to complete request.
A Jealous Male has arrived to defend his mate!
Heirad begins to cast Surging Chain!
Heirad begins to channel Lightning Field!
Ciphas dooms <<1>>!
Ciphas strangles <<1>>!
Kel'sara commands Dread Guards to assist her!
Kel'sara casts Force Leech on <<1>>!
Operator IX targets <<1>> with blue deletion protocol!
Operator IX targets <<1>> with orange deletion protocol!
Operator IX targets <<1>> with purple deletion protocol!
Operator IX targets <<1>> with yellow deletion protocol!
Nightmare Timed Run: Timer starts now, 2 hours remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 1.5 hours remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 1 hour remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 45 minutes remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 30 minutes remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 15 minutes remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 10 minutes remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 5 minutes remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: 1 minute remaining.
Nightmare Timed Run: Timer expired.
Attackers are approaching from the North!
Attackers are approaching from the South!
Attackers are approaching from the West!
Attackers are approaching from the East!
A Champion enters the battlefield from the North!
A Champion enters the battlefield from the South!
A Champion enters the battlefield from the West!
A Champion enters the battlefield from the East!
The Terror from Beyond enters a furious tantrum!
A Hypergate Anomaly appears!
The Hypergate Anomaly has spread to a new platform!
Failed to achieve Red Obtuse. Activating Green Bisector.
You feel a strange and chilling presence.
Kephess has become all-powerful from defeating his foes!
<<1>> has absorbed the calming pheromones!
The Environmental Isolation Field Generator has run out of power!
<<1>> has become lost in the sandstorm!
<<1>> has activated a deletion shield!
Forcefield deactivating in 3 seconds!
Forcefield deactivating in 2 seconds!
Forcefield deactivating in 1 second!
The humming of the power converter is attracting hungry xuvvas!
The xuvvas have destroyed the shield's power source, rendering it unusable!
Oasis City Infiltration Event started!
Find and defeat the Operations Chief and the four patrol teams without raising an alarm.
move quickly! If you take too long, the general city population will eventually notice and report you.
10 minutes remaining...
5 minutes remaining...
3 minutes remaining...
1 minute remaining...
You have been noticed by the general population and reported to Security (Time limit exceeded)!
Oasis City Infiltration Failed
Participant Species! Circumstances evolve Purple Tangent!
This unit advances gratitude for selfless self-nominations.
Participant Species' blue obtuse progresses research toward Red Octagon.
Formulating Test Plan...
Evaluating Thermal Tolerance...
Problem! This unit's nanite shield confers immunity from attacks and repairs damage.
Evaluating battle-awareness of environment cues...
Loading final evaluation...
Participant species will demonstrate full battle output capacity.
This unit will supply urgency to heighten response-performance.
Execute!
Participant performance Yellow Convex. Encouraging improved responsiveness...
Comparing participants against species archives...
Experiment time limit exceeded! Clearing research area for future experiments...
Test initiated! Setting time limit: 10 minutes.
Test initiated! Setting time limit: 8 minutes.
Snipers activating defensive protocols.
Snipers activating defensive protocols activating in 4 seconds . . .
Snipers activating defensive protocols activating in 3 seconds . . .
Snipers activating defensive protocols activating in 2 seconds . . .
Snipers activating defensive protocols activating in 1 second . . .
Defensive protocols activated!
Titan Six has thrown a huge grenade at you!

<<1>> has engaged Green Team!
<<1>> has engaged Gold Team!
<<1>> has engaged Red Team!
<<1>> broke the magnetic shackles!
Access Denied: Oasis City currently under emergency lockdown.
Preparation complete! Participant Species may begin the experiment at any time.
Compiling suitable interactive research exercise. Please stand by...
A Mercenary Firebug has targeted <<1>>!
<<1>> received the credit token!
Captain Horic is firing in <<1>>'s direction!
<<1>> is trapped in a nightmare!
6 minutes remaining...
Sunder has fixated on <<1>>!
Titan 6 has thrown a huge grenade at <<1>>!
Effusive jubilation! Please accept material-form positive reinforcement!
This unit rejoices in participant species' generous data contributions.
Combat data analysis will soon achieve blue acute!
Encounter is already active
3 minutes remaining.
Sandstorm simulation activated.
The poisonous spores have severely weakened the Enhanced Vrblther.
Enhanced Vrblther has re-adjusted to his climate.
This flashpoint is balanced for a group of any two to four players.
Security Protocols Activated!
You may be unable to complete this conversation with a party because you have already completed "Contact Handling" today.
You must be grouped to use a Courtesy Kolto Station.
Your macrobinoculars detect something in this area.
Choose your curse and prepare for your challenge!
The portals have opened! Begin your challenge!
You need Curse of the Incompetent to use this portal.
You need Curse of the Weakling to use this portal.
You need Curse of the Coward to use this portal.
Your healers are incompetent! Raptus has become stronger.
Your damage dealers are weaklings! Raptus has become stronger.
Your tanks are cowards! Raptus has become stronger.
The pure seed has been planted! The corruption of the future has ended.
The pure seed has been destroyed! The future is doomed!
The pure seed has been planted incorrectly! The future is doomed!
Challenges end in 60 seconds!
Challenges end in 30 seconds!
Challenges end in 15 seconds!
Challenges end in 5 seconds!
Your attempt was pathetic! Raptus becomes stronger!
Calphayus' prophecy is complete, the future is doomed!
You do not need this right now.

TG-5 experiment prepares to use Chemical Attraction!
A Dread Tentacle is targeting <<1>>!
<<1>> has begun the healing challenge!
<<1>> has begun the damage challenge!
<<1>> has begun the tank challenge!
A Combustible Seed has been planted on <<1>>!

Dreadmaster Bestia has returned to her throne to recuperate!
Dreadmaster Raptus has returned to his throne to recuperate!
Dreadmaster Calphayus has returned to his throne to recuperate!

The South Gate has been shut.

Access to the East Gate has been shut.

West Inner Gate has been shut.

East Inner Gate has been shut.

Access to the West Gate has been shut.
<<1>> has passed through the South Gate.
<<1>> has passed through the West Inner Gate.
<<1>> has passed through the East Inner Gate.
<<1>> has passed through the West Gate access tunnel.
<<1>> has passed through the East Gate access tunnel.
Raptus challenges <<1>> to stand and face him!
Corruptor Zero is charging to full power!
No more Seats of Knowledge remain, the future is doomed!
The Seat of Knowledge has been reset!
All challenges have been passed! Raptus is not impressed.
The time to prevent Calphayus' vision from becoming reality has expired! The future is doomed!
You are already authorized to hunt this Kingpin once per week. You can trade this item back to the Bounty Contract Broker to refund your Completed Contracts.
Console 1 deactivating...
Console 2 deactivating...
Forcefield shutdown successful!
Console 1 resetting...
Console 2 resetting...
You've found some EMP grenades in the weapons stockpile.

Reinforcements approaching from the west!

The exit is now authorized for use.
You've been ambushed by enemy command!

Sync successful! Forcefield shutdown initiated...

The Holding Cell outer doors have been unlocked.
The western cell block is now accessible.
Cell access denied. Security protocols active.
The eastern cell block is now accessible.

The visions of Calphayus are preventing the seed from being planted!

A Riot Suppression Droid transfers its shield to Sairisi!
A Riot Suppression Droid has transferred its shield to itself!
A Riot Suppression Droid has finished repairing, and transfers its shield to Sairisi!
You must be at least level 47 to use this service.
GSI Satellites are already tracking your location.
Energy Pulse Detected. Shielding Countermeasures Activated.
Energy Pulse Subsided. Shielding Countermeasures Reinitializing.
Balls of Force lightning are headed for the Energy Dispersion Tower!
The remaining adversary rages at the death of their ally!
The forcefield has been disabled!
Sparky's shield collar has absorbed too much damage and overloaded! The beast is stunned!
Sparky leaps about in an unfocused rampage!
Sparky momentarily falters under the weight of his accumulated injuries!
Sparky pounces <<1>> in a brutal rage!
Sparky's shield collar reactivates in overdrive!
Torque has destroyed an engine control console! If too many are destroyed the carrier will fall from the sky!
Too many controls have been destroyed! The ship is crashing!
The Revanite Centurion braces himself...
Deron Cadoruso prepares to enter the fray...
Deron Cadoruso leaps into the battle!
Deron Cadoruso withdraws to his platform.
Sano Thrica prepares to enter the fray...
Sano Thrica leaps into the battle!
Sano Thrica withdraws to his platform.
Lord Kurse prepares to enter the fray...
Lord Kurse leaps into the battle!
Lord Kurse withdraws to his platform.
The three commanders join together!
The Blade of Revan pursues <<1>>!
The Blade of Alek pursues <<1>>!
You have entered a flashpoint in Story Mode.
A Combat Support Droid has been provided to assist you in combat.
If your droid is defeated, you may call a replacement by clicking the "Activate Combat Support Droid" button in your mission tracker.
Sword Squadron Unit 1 has launched a grenade at <<1>>!
Use the Exit Area button above your mini-map to exit the Flashpoint.
Ruugar has grabbed <<1>>! Any damage done to Ruugar will be absorbed by <<1>> instead!
Satele Shan has been incapacitated. You have lost Battle Clarity.
Ruugar has activated the self destruct! The ship will be destroyed in 15 seconds, get to the escape pods!
Unfortunately this escape pod has been deactivated for routine maintenance.
Strongest of the Hunt
Mountain of Death
River Assassin
Water Slime
Cunning Eye

Kyramla Gemas'rugam
Quartermaster Bulo has called drunken pirates to his aid!
Quartermaster Bulo has deployed unstable carts and load lifters!
All incoming shipments will be redirected to facility recycling plant.
Ammunition and armor rerouted to facility bathrooms.
Genetic specimens flagged for delivery to facility kitchens.
Facility shipping and inventory records marked for deep sea jettison.
The Ancient Threat will disappear if drawn too far from the altar.
<<1>> has been cursed by the Monolith!
The Monolith has exposed ancient energies of Ziost
The thermal sensors throughout the facility will quickly bring the core under control!
Without the thermal sensors, the core will be vulnerable for some time!
The Colossal Monolith is going to siphon energy from one of the rifts!
SYSTEM :: Safety Protocols Disabled :: Firing Sequence Available
SYSTEM :: Reset Complete :: Firing Sequence Available
The Worldbreaker Monolith is tied to this location and will not leave.
<<1>> has the Baradium Bomb! Take it under the walker to disable it!
Heirad begins to cast Surging Chain! Break Ciphas' shield and interrupt his channel to end it!
Data Core shields in Safety Configuration Blue. One Blue Bisector in the indicated area while the other uses the console will override the shield.
Data Core shields in Safety Configuration Orange. One Orange Bisector in the indicated area while the other uses the console will override the shield.
Data Core shields in Safety Configuration Purple. One Purple Bisector in the indicated area while the other uses the console will override the shield.
Data Core shields in Safety Configuration Yellow. One Yellow Bisector in the indicated area while the other uses the console will override the shield.
Behavior Override Activated
Behavior Override Deactivated
You have picked up a Carbonite Grenade. This will allow you to stun yourself or your companion to prevent them from taking damage.
The Breaktown Brawler has marked <<1>> for a beat down!
Probe must be deployed within the marked area near the Sarlacc Pit
Medical Unit AZ-01 activates its healing protocol!

The Iknayid has an adverse reaction to the Toxic Grenade!
Use this to your advantage!
Lanos deploys Skytrooper Shielders to protect him and charge up his attacks!
Use an Interrupt, Stun, or Knockback to disrupt the charged shielding!
Lanos calls a squad of Skytrooper reinforcements!
Lanos deploys a group of exploding droids! Avoid their blast radius!
Chompers the Undying enters a regenerative state...
Chompers the Undying has regenerated!
Conraad Om'wurt's morale is affected by Chompers the Undying's state! Now dealing more damage at the cost of defense!
Conraad Om'wurt's morale is restored by Chompers the Undying's recovery! Combat abilities have returned to normal!
Chompers the Undying is enraged by Conraad Om'wurt's death! All attacks have increased in ferocity!
A Fury Mortar's blast has destroyed an Emergency Kolto Station!
Damage has momentarily incapacitated the walker!
Eternal Champion Zotar enters the fray!
The walker completes its repairs and stands again!
Your assault forces Zotar to retreat before his walker is fully repaired!
Eternal Champion Zotar returns to his walker!
A Fury Mortar's blast has destroyed a Probe!
A Fire Support Probe has destroyed another with its laser!
Chompers the Undying has lost the will to regenerate upon Conraad Om'wurt's death! Chompers is now dead...
Combat Unit AZ-02 activates its damage buff protocol!
The attack is tracking your movement!
Get out of the area of effect before the attack is executed!
Use your defensive cooldowns to mitigate the damage!
Zotar prepares to electrify the outer portion of the arena floor!
The Walker focuses its weapon systems!
Zotar manages to activate the walker's autopilot!
Zotar's knockbacks are now unstoppable!
Ronum Minkus stealths out of the fight!
Ronum Minkus deploys a trap!!

Ronum Minkus is devastated by Little Gut's defeat!!
He stealths away in shame...
Ronum Minkus appears on the spectator balcony!
Nocturno charges forward!
Drake Raven has been defeated! His utility belt falls to the floor!
Nocturno has been defeated! Drake Raven must now become the champion Zakuul needs!
Nocturno has become momentarily exhausted and vulnerable!
Nocturno has been caught by a stun mine!
Your sidekick has been kidnapped! You must rescue them!
Nocturno assumes her trademark stance, "Perfect Defense"!
Nocturno is momentarily blinded!
Nocturno charges wildly!
Nocturno flies into a rage at the loss of her sidekick!
<<1>> has picked up Drake Raven's utility belt!
Drake Raven's utility belt breaks, rendering it useless!
Assault Units join the fray!
The Doom Droid deploys a pulse charging node!
Pulse charging successful, initiating final attack sequence!
Pulse charging failure, reinitiating attack systems...
Advanced Combat Units appear and begin charging the node...
Nocturno's mounting injuries send her into an aggressive rage!
Drake Raven has ascended! He is the hero now!
Little Gut flips you over from the edge of the arena!
An Apprentice Handler joins Little Gut in the fight!
The Apprentice Handler calls forth Bogwings!
Only the Phase Owner may use this.
You pick up the Zakuul Knight's Shield!
An attack throws you off balance, lowering your shield!
You must be piloting a walker to use this.
A kill squad for <<1>> has been released.
<<1>> has been scanned. Deploying matching squad...
Elarea has set her sight on <<1>> for a duel.
The Duel begins! <<1>> must face Elarea alone!
Forgemaster Droub is firing in <<1>>'s direction!
The Hydration Controller's shield has depleted!
The Ventilation Controller's shield has depleted!
Enemy Technicians join the fray!
Mesok takes aim from up high. Avoid his attacks!
Enemy Reinforcements attempt to flank you. Look out!
Malfunctioning droids activated. Watch out!
General Rike's Hover Tank has engaged its shield and is regenerating.

Forgemaster Droub's shield is down

If your droid is defeated, you may call a replacement by clicking the "Activate Alliance Support Droid" button in your mission tracker.

You already have the Inferno Grenade ability!

G9-RX goes haywire!
Poisonous Gas fills the room! Find a way out!

Penzaren's shield focus weakens!
Penzaren's shield focus is almost gone!

Penzaren's shields are fully focused!

You cannot interact with this vendor while piloting a vehicle or droid.
You must be facing the train wreckage

West Sterilization Array: Critical infrastructure detected in path

West Shield Generator: Primary system offline, auxillery defense activated

An amplifier has been destroyed due to an Energy Chare overload.
A new makeshift amplifier drone has been deployed.
The timer for Doom's Delay has begun; there are 90 minutes remaining.
You acquire a spare power cell!
This station is out of power cells.
You already have a spare power cell.
Spare power cell activated.
Tiny claws skitter excitedly across the hangar floor...
You place a treat inside.
Scritchy gleefully scampers off to explore!
Scritchy is ready for transport, but where could he go without causing problems?
Scritchy is ready for transport!
You release Scritchy.
This area is undergoing maintenance. Priority transport to the Imperial Fleet will commence in 5 seconds.
This area is undergoing maintenance. Priority transport to the Republic Fleet will commence in 5 seconds.
